Pilot

Jul 7, 2019

Welcome to my new website! This is the second iteration of my personal website, with this version built using Jekyll. I’ll be using this blog to keep track of any notable projects or thoughts that I come up with in the future.

I would have preferred the domain “ericli.com”, but the owners of the domain asked for a ludicrous $4000 dollars. Unfortunate.

This project is maintained by ericli. Contact me through Email or LinkedIn.
